title: Providing opportunity to the public to visit National Parks, Entertainment Parks, Botanical Gardens and to watch movies in cinema halls free of charge on the 75th Independence Day
decision_details: - The proposal made by the Hon. President to provide opportunity to the public to visit National Parks, Botanical Gardens and Entertainment Parks/Places free of charge and also to provide opportunity to watch movies with 50% off for ticket prices of the Cinema Halls located across the country on 75th Independence Day falling on 4th February 2023, was approved by the Cabinet.
